00021 #include "boost/mpl/void_fwd.hpp"
00022 #include "boost/mpl/bool.hpp"
00023 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/msvc.hpp"
00024 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/workaround.hpp"
00025 
00026 namespace boost {
00027 namespace mpl {
00028 
00029 //  [JDG Feb-4-2003] made void_ a complete type to allow it to be
00030 //  instantiated so that it can be passed in as an object that can be
00031 //  used to select an overloaded function. Possible use includes signaling
00032 //  a zero arity functor evaluation call.
00033 struct void_ { typedef void_ type; };
00034 
00035 template< typename T >
00036 struct is_void_
00037     : false_
00038 {
00039 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, < 1300)
00040     using false_::value;
00041 #endif
00042 };
00043 
00044 template<>
00045 struct is_void_<void_>
00046     : true_
00047 {
00048 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, < 1300)
00049     using true_::value;
00050 #endif
00051 };
00052 
00053 } // namespace mpl
00054 } // namespace boost
00055 
00056 #endif // BOOST_MPL_VOID_HPP_INCLUDED
